AI Description: Kissplice is a bioinformatics tool designed for the analysis of RNA-Seq data to identify and quantify various types of RNA splicing events such as exon skipping, intron retention, and alternative 5' or 3' splicing.
Core Features: Identification Of Various RNA Splicing Events, Quantification Of Splicing Events, Visualization Of Splicing Patterns, Detection Of Novel Splicing Events, Analysis Of Alternative Splicing Dynamics
